title: Renovated 1 bedroom available now at 4800 Brown street!
description:
Experience forward-thinking urban living.
1, 2 & 3 bedroom luxury loft-style apartments located in an affordable up-and-coming district just north of University City make up this 34-unit complex. We offer thoughtful architecture and design creating a contemporary feel in an old factory setting. Elevator access, stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and garbage disposal, a multi-camera security system, intercom system with remote door buzzer, on-site laundry, high ceilings, custom cabinetry with self-closing hardware, granite counters, kitchen pantry, exposed brick & concrete in many units, tile flooring, central heat & air, LED lighting, extra large commercial sized windows, large closets and large bright common hallways will be more than enough to make you want to come home!
Live the uptown urban lifestyle you crave!
Amenities:
-Water $35.00 per month
-Elevator
-Assigned gated parking available for car and scooters ($150 per space, coming Summer 2021)
-Multi-camera security system
-Intercom system with electronic door opener
-On-site laundry
-Choice of Comcast or Verizon
-Full-size stainless steel appliances
-Bus line at corner
-Garbage disposal
-High ceilings
-Large closets
-Custom cabinetry with self closing cabinet doors & drawers
-Sinks with magnetic retractable faucet hose
-Granite counters
-Pantries
-Exposed ductwork, brick & concrete floors/ceilings (in some units)
-Central air and heat
In addition to monthly rent, tenant is responsible for their own electricity bill, a water fee of $35 & a liability insurance fee of $9.50

title: Well-Kept & Modern 3 Bed, 1.5 Bath Home w/W/D, C/A and more!
description:
A Very well kept 3 bed 1 & 1-1/2 bath home with high ceilings, hardwood floors throughout, open floor plan, brand new washer and dryer on first floor, central A/C , wonderful private stone covered backyard space and so much more. Located in the very popular Point Breeze Section of South Philadelphia. Kitchen was recently updated with granite counter tops, a newer gas range, dishwasher and a new refrigerator installed. At the back of the house on the first floor there is a large pantry area with shelves and new front loading washer and dryer. 1/2 bath is off of the living room and has a charming window to the back of the house.The back yard space is flanked by beautiful distressed brick walls with a small gate that leads to the tiny alleyway for emergency exits. The basement is unfinished but dry and has high ceilings great for storage or work room / workout area. Heading to the 2nd floor you find the larger full sized bathroom with white subway tile walls and large tub at the top of the steps. The back bedroom has bay windows overlooking the private back yard area. The middle bedroom is the smaller of the 3 bedrooms but still has a closet and can fit a twin bed. Finally the primary bedroom at the front of the home bost bright sun filled windows, high ceilings and a nice sized closet. Call today to come see this very nice home that has everything a tenant could ask for. Set up your time to see this bright and fresh home today!! title: Here is your opportunity to live in spacious 1 bedroom!
description:
Here is your opportunity to live in one of the most sought after neighborhoods of Philadelphia. This newly renovated spacious 1 bedroom is located in Old City surrounded by art galleries, shops, cafes, and amazing restaurants. The WireWorks building stands timeless with its red brick exterior. The main entrance has a pristine kept garden terrace and covered walkway. Bright natural light illuminates the spacious living area and calls attention to the ultimate open floor plan that allows for plenty of options depending on your lifestyle. Design one large living area or designate space for a dining area - the opportunities are endless. The newly renovated kitchen overlooks the living space and features everything you need to prepare the perfect meal, including ample cabinet space, quartz countertops, and modern stainless steel amenities. The character of the residence continues into the bedroom, where elevated ceilings, tons of space, and beautiful natural light make this the ultimate retreat. The photos show a corner screen, which once removed opens up the bedroom space. The bathroom is newly renovated, clean and contemporary, and includes a spacious vanity sink and shower. Just outside the bathroom is the washer and dryer. The Condo has large windows allowing sunlight to flood the space highlighting the character of the exposed brick walls. The Wireworks provides secured entry off a private courtyard. Residents have a private driveway, perfect for loading and unloading. There is a parking garage across the street for a monthly fee or permit parking from the city for street parking at very low annual cost (consult PPA for details). Bike storage is available in the courtyard level as well as storage in the ceiling within the condo. Conveniently located just steps from Sassafras Market, Cafe Ole, Race Street Cafe and loads of unique restaurants, boutiques and art galleries. Stroll down to the exciting new attractions along the waterfront which include: Race Street Pier, Cherry Street Pier, Harbor Park, Blue Cross River Rink. Book your tour now as this chance to own in one of Philadelphia's most premier buildings will not be around for long! Tenant pays electric, gas, cable, internet, and phone. $70 per person application fee. One time $400 move in/move out fee. Must schedule move in with HOA during weekday. Move in is Monday-Friday 8:00-noon. Minimum 1 year lease. No smoking. No pets. Application includes credit check, verification of income, verification of employment, criminal and background check, previous housing check.

title: 2 bed w/ den in Malvern PA
description:
Property Description
Westgate Village is surrounded by six acres of land in the heart of Chester County. We are near several major highways and near the Great Valley Corporate Center. The apartment homes have been remodeled to give it a more modern look. Each apartment home has its own private entrance, fully equipped kitchen, and washer and dryer. Westgate Village has become a popular home to those who enjoy the serenity and convenience of the suburbs and easy accessibility to shopping and entertainment.The Tredyffrin is a 2 bedroom apartment on the second floor. The Tredyffrin offers a large living space with sliding doors to your private patio. The living room is open to the dining room which features a ceiling fan. In your kitchen there are two large windows and plenty of storage space in your 16 cabinets. This floor plan includes a bonus room & bonus closet! In your kitchen you will find the den. The den has a window for additional natural light and can be used as an office, storage, sitting area, or anything you may need it for! You also have a walk-in pantry with built in shelving. In your first bedroom you have two closets (one is a walk-in!) and two windows. In your second bedroom you have 1 large closet and two windows. The hallway also includes a linen closet. The rest room is multi-functional! It is divided into two separate areas: the vanity area and the shower area. The rest room also has a closet which holds your very own washer and dryer!

title: Live at Park Towne Place Apartment Homes
description:
Live at Park Towne Place Apartment Homes in Center City Philadelphia, and you'll be blocks from the center of nightlife in Logan Square and Rittenhouse Square. Unit features modern kitchens, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washers and dryers, breakfast bars, pendant lighting, tile backsplashes, wood plank flooring throughout, walk-in closets. Stunning city and museum views are offered in a variety of floor plans! Mainstreet Market and Caf , featuring gourmet coffee and tea and much more! Fitness center with Technogym equipment, Queenax boxing gym, yoga/spin studio with indoor/outdoor workout space. It boasts Philadelphia's largest pools, an art studio, fitness center with boxing gym, yoga/spin studio, social lounge with demonstration kitchen, gourmet market and cafe, outdoor lounge with fire pit, 24-hour concierge, 24/7 package acceptance, resident shuttle service to Center City and University City and more. Make Whole Foods as your second kitchen conveniently located just 1 block away. Our apartments are within one mile of several institutions of higher education: Drexel University, Temple University, University of Penn, CHOP, Moore college of Arts, Community College of Philadelphia. You won't find a better building to live with amenities in the Fairmount Area. Park Towne Place includes 948 apartment and penthouse homes within four high-rise towers. The community is nestled between green acres on the Benjamin Franklin Parkway in the heart of Center City Philadelphia's Museum District. Park Town. ** Prices and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **
2202 Benjamin Franklin Pkwy #OB1BA

title: Rittenhouse Square Studio Apt Home with Wood Floors, City Skyline View
description:
The studio apartment home at 2307 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 23rd floor (of 26 floors) features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as December 15, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, Tselaine, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar or Coco Blue Spruce. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, or Barclay Prime. Dine out at Pietro's, Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, The Continental Mid-town, or Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Alchemy, or Elixr. Have a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen or Jeni's. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery or pick up a turkey club at Marathon on the Square. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum or Barnes Foundation. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 AM to 2 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

title: Renovated Town House Near Penn. Cat and Dog Friendly
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.
This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase. Exposed brick accent wall in the living room with plenty of natural light. Brand new bathroom and renovated kitchen in 2021. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor and plenty of storage in the basement.
Spacious brick back patio with a large Magnolia tree that gives this back yard shade and privacy in the summer.
This house is pet friendly.
The house is only two blocks from the market street El, which gives easy access to Center City and elsewhere. Easy walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores. Additionally, there are multiple dining and entertainment options within walking distance. Major highways and access to center city and the airport is just minutes away.
Phone interviews first before touring.
For the safety of everyone, mask must be warn when touring the property and hand sanitizer.
Background checks are done with National Tenant Network for all candidates. There is a security deposit and background check fee.
Lease ends August 30, 2023.

title: Beautiful 2 bd 2 ba, roof top and finished basement 19146
description:
Absolute rare find in the booming Point Breeze neighborhood of South Philly. You will feel like family on this quiet street full of amazing neighbors! Enjoy this completely renovated modern townhouse just blocks off Washington Ave. This 2 bedroom, 2 full bathroom home comes with a finished basement, hardwood flooring, an electric fireplace, in unit washer/dryer, tons of natural light and a rare fiberglass roof deck with unobstructed skyline views! The open first floor layout offers tons of space for a formal living and dining area setup. Snuggle up and get cozy in front of the remote controlled electric fireplace equipped with a tv mount and wood shelving. The remote controlled fireplace provides ton of heat and provides beautiful ambiance with its color changing lights. Continue on to the large dining area where you can entertain guests and enjoy formal meals. The first floor is highlighted by the sleek farmhouse style kitchen. Here you will find White and Blue soft close European style cabinets with gold trim, a gold chef's faucet, garbage disposal, Quartz countertops and Black Stainless Steel Appliances including a Wi-Fi enabled smart fridge, undercabinet microwave and gas stove with overhead range. The rear fenced in patio offers some additional private outdoor space in addition to the rooftop. Downstairs you will find a finished basement with a full custom bathroom with standing shower. The basement also contains the utility closet and a laundry room with washer & dryer. Venture up to the second floor via the handmade floating staircase where you will find 2 large bedrooms and a beautifully crafted custom bathroom that will leave you speechless. Enter The spa like bathroom, via a sliding pocket door, that consists of a white ceramic tub and standing shower outfitted with a brushed gold rainfall showerhead and hand spray. The blue standing vanity dressed with a brushed gold faucet is perfectly accented by the Ceramic Moroccan floor tile. Just outside the bathroom you will find the first bedroom that gets amazing sunlight throughout the day, perfect for a roommate or home office. At the end of the hallway sits the master bedroom. The master contains ample space, his and her closets, 3 large windows and a charming wood trim accent wall that brings unparalleled character and flare. Climb the stairs another floor up to what makes this home such a sweet and rare find, your very own private roof deck. Enjoy your morning coffee while you watch the sunrise and enjoy dinner or drinks with loved ones under the starlit sky as you watch the sunset just beyond the Philadelphia skyline on this fiberglass roof deck. Home is equipped with a NEST thermostat.
Tenants pay all utilities including water, gas and electric. Pets per owner's discretion and require additional nonrefundable pet deposit.

title: New Kitchen, Tons of Natural Light, Balcony, Kitty Friendly
description:
Do you find yourself watching the world go by. Well here is a chance to get a birds eye view of the world in the heart of University City. Huge One bedroom apartment with an extra room that can be curtained off or used as a den. The apartment has tons of gorgeous natural light. There are six closets in the apartment so it has a lot of storage. Hardwood floors through out. Balcony overlooking the corner of 48th and Cedar.
New kitchen with granite countertops, subway tile, and appliances. Garage disposal too.
The apartment is a mother-in-law suite, which means you go through the owners house to get to the apartment. Because of that, we are being really careful who we rent to. We would prefer a couple or single person, who loves their own space, but will respect our space as they go through. No parties are allowed. The rent is lower than normal for this size apartment.
Cats are ok, but no dogs. We have a dog though so you must like dogs.
There is a Washer and Dryer in the building. Tenants pay electrical and gas. Gas bill is only for the stove.
This apartment is a block from Baltimore Avenue, 4 blocks from Clark Park, a block from Mariposa Grocery store, Local Pez, Gold Standard, and near many restaurants and bars. Its a great family friendly neighborhood with large trees.
Call Mike to set up an appointment. No calls before 9 am or after 9 pm

title: COME TO THE OPEN HOUSE! 933 Henry Ave, Wayne, PA Sat, Sept 7th!
description: Welcome to this charming 3 BR /1Bath Colonial in Tredyffrin Township! Entry is through a large covered front porch into the main hall. Extra large living room, dining room, and kitchen finish out the first floor. Second floor has 3 bedrooms, 1 full bathroom, and an additional room which can be used as a small office or closet. There is a wonderful walk up attic to a third level which could easily be finished for additional living space.  The full unfinished basement is a great space for extra storage. The dining room leads to a screened  porch which overlooks the backyard and is perfect for enjoying your morning coffee or relaxing after a long day. This park like yard is a blank canvas and is wonderful for entertaining or sports. The house has great bones and with some updating and a personal touch would be a wonderful place for anyone to call home.

title: Charming 1BR APT Manayunk
description:
Charming & spacious one bedroom apartment in the Manayunk section of Philadelphia. The apartment features an open concept living and kitchen area, washer dryer in unit, gas stove & central heating and air conditioning.  The apartment also has a basement, perfect for storage!
The apartment is a 10/15 minute walk to Main street and is within walking distance to many restaurants, gyms, and local stores. There is easy access to the regional rail train stations and the septa buses run right along Ridge ave. Close to all major roadways with easy access to Rt. 1, 76 and many others.
Tenants are responsible for electricity, gas, water (flat rate of $25/month), an cable/internet.
Please call/email/text to schedule a tour. Serious inquiries only!

title: Sweet Mt Airy Renovated 3 Bedroom House
description:
This is the one you have been looking for. Tasteful renovation of this 3bed/1bath Mt. Airy home. Very quiet street and ouse is elevated and set back from street level with small front yard and porch offering privacy. Open concept first floor with lots of natural light, kitchen with wood cabinetry, dishwasher and gas range. Huge rear patio space with new pressure treated privacy fence. Hardwood floors, new ceiling fans and window treatments throughout the home.  Partially finished basement with recessed lighting, and brand new full size washer and dryer makes a great work space or storage.
Easy access to bus and regional rail lines as well as Germantown and Mt. Airy attractions, restaurants, cafes, and bars including Adelie Coffee House,
Ultimo Café, Germantown Espresso Bar, Attic Brewing, Young American Cider, Maker Artisan Pizza, Malelani Café, Juice Room, Jansen, Zsa’s Ice Cream, and the Frosted Fox.
Enjoy living in one of the most proudly diverse and historical zip codes in the nation with easy access to some of the regions best outdoor areas including the Wissahickon Valley Park /hiking and biking trails, Pastorious Park, Carpenters Woods, Cresheim Valley and much more.
Available October 1 or any date before. Tenant pays all utilities. First month, last month and security deposit due at lease signing. Pets allowed upon landlord approval and with additional monthly pet fee.

title: Magnificent 2 Bedroom/2 Bathroom Apartment Available To Rent w/Garden
description:
Looking for a magnificent, New York style live/work space in popular Queen Village/Bella Vista neighborhoods . No commuting, this layout provides perfect balance of professional and personal life. Enter through the garden gate and walk down brick pathway passing an impressive weeping willow tree and a courtyard full of native plants that runs almost 100' in length leading to a terrace where you can barbecue and entertain in a peaceful urban oasis far from the madding crowd. Pass through over-sized sliding doors and you are surrounded by sleek modern designed space 2200 sf with polished concrete floors and radiant heat, 11' high ceilings, 2 large skylights visually connecting trees and vegetation, bringing in sunshine and air and blurring boundaries between office and nature and living space. This area easily converted into sleeping quarters plus the creation of a living room overlooking the unique, wondrous garden. The European style kitchen features luxurious appliances Liebherr fridge, Bosch convection oven, dishwasher, and microwave, Grohe, large pantry with custom built ins and cabinetry. Gorgeous white oak flooring separates dining area with a buon fresco, by artist Jason Spivak surrounding the center wall opening bordering the kitchen. To the right of the kitchen is a full bathroom with designer quality toto, grohe, kohler complimented by crisp white subway tile, plus laundry room comprising Bosch washer/dryer and custom built ins. Continuing to the front of the building, there is a second full brand new contemporary bathroom plus a hall closet and an additional large room, with high ceilings that could be utilized as an office or a second bedroom or a studio. Generous closet space provided throughout. Come and explore the possibilities of the most Outdoorsy live and work space ever or just live........here. Its inspiring. These photos are prior to current tenant who is finishing their one year lease.

description:
Bedrooms: 0Bathrooms: 1Square Feet: 339Address: 1401 Arch StreetLocated in Philadelphia’s historic Center City neighborhood, One City offers modern elegance with timeless grandeur. With views of Philadelphia's City Hall and just steps away from iconic Philly locations such as the Pennsylvania Convention Center, Reading Terminal Market, and Love Park, One City offers sophisticated luxury in the heart of Philadelphia. One City offers the most discerning residents the ultimate living experience. title: Furnished Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment on Rittenhouse Square, Roof Deck
description:
Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 15th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The large windows face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters! This kitchen is also fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to stay in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries! Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Whole Foods, and Sprouts are grocery stores within walking distance! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, L'Occitane, Boyds, and Sephora. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Via Locusta, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Aleksandar, Alice Pizza, Marathon Grill, and Marathon on the Square. Sip a coffee at Ultimo, La Colombe, Elixr, Alchemy, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Pick up a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Grab a selection of scones at Metropolitan Bakery. Savor a scoop of ice cream from Van Leeuwen or Jeni's.
